title: Klondike Gold Rush - Seattle Unit National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons               Operating Hours & Seasons         Check in with a ranger for special activities and programs happening during your visit. NPS/John Chao  Visitor Center Summer Schedule  through September 5 The park is open daily from 9:00am to 5:00pm. We will be open for the Independence Day and Labor Day holidays.  Winter operating hours begin September 6, in which the park will be open from 10:00am to 5:0pm daily. The park will be closed on Thanksgiving Day, December 25 and January 1.   Ranger Station at REI Schedule  Outdoor Recreation Information Center  Rangers from State Parks, US Forest Service and the National Park Service staff this information desk seven days a week, 10:00am to 6:00pm.      Trails & Rails Summer Schedule  Visit with our volunteer guides onboard Amtrak's trains this summer through the Trails & Rails program.  The Coast Starlight program (from/to Seattle and Portland) runs through September 25. The Empire Builder program (from/to Seattle and Havre, MT) runs through September 17.
